characters.name: Cat
characters.description: A small feline with a sleek, agile body. Its fur is a mix of white and grey, with striking green eyes and a long, curved tail.

characters.name: Dog
characters.description: A medium-sized dog with short, brown fur and floppy ears. It has a white patch on its chest and expressive, round eyes.

scenes.background_description: A vibrant city park in the afternoon with lush green grass and tall leafy trees. The park is dotted with colorful flowers and has a clear blue sky overhead. A winding path leads through the park, lined with small benches and a few scattered toys. The atmosphere is lively yet serene, depicted in a vivid illustrative style.
scenes.narration_text: Cat chases Dog through the bustling city park, weaving between trees and dodging park benches.
